amendment.description: Amendment allows unaccompanied homeless youth to be considered as independent students.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-401 to allow unaccompanied homeless youth be considered independent students upon verification of their living situation by a McKinney-Vento Act school district liaison, a shelter director, or a financial aid administrator.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggert amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mrs. Biggert.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggert amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
